summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1801, for the improvement of Twenty-second Avenue Southwest, from the north line of Star Addition to West Seattle to the north margin of West Andover Street; and West Andover Street, from the west margin of Twenty-second Avenue Southwest to the west margin of Twenty-first Avenue Southwest, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 18700, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
